output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF11240017" is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate: Yes - directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu", who is a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes - it's a paid Facebook/Instagram post with 4,000-4,999 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes - discusses government measures and future implementation of proposals "alongside Marcel Ciolacu" 5. Journalism: No - this is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion: No - this is an organized campaign message with CMF number
The post describes a campaign meeting and explicitly promotes PSD's governance program and Marcel Ciolacu as a leader. It uses campaign hashtag "#caleasigurapentruromania" and includes a CMF number, which is typically used for electoral campaign materials.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes Marcel Ciolacu and PSD's governance program - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Uses campaign messaging and hashtags - Discusses future implementation of proposals with Marcel Ciolacu
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 925418612429053) dupa incheierea perioadei de propaganda pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea, care include numarul CMF11240017, promoveaza explicit candidatul Marcel Ciolacu si programul sau de guvernare, folosind hashtag-ul de campanie "#caleasigurapentruromania". Mesajul are caracter electoral evident, promovand masurile si propunerile ce urmeaza a fi implementate "alaturi de presedintele Marcel Ciolacu", influentand astfel intentiile de vot ale publicului tinta (4000-4999 impresii) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024.
